testcase.name: testBcryptDecryptShouldSupportLegacyKeyDerivationProcess
testcase.system-err: [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Plaintext: This is a plaintext message. The value can be obtained in the calling code by invoking 'cipher.getIV()'; [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Cipher text (91): 2432612431322471617033596c7a542e6a304a4c46656f6848367655654e69466953414c548db78b9f930c40caad2e09a9efd075de4e6946694956d06af78ff0995a296c8391833e77f19a586ca577084c64efd923a186ca972b1b [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Creating Bcrypt hash with salt [b1caf96a7d55025d8b34782a8c9f315a] (16 bytes) [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Generated Bcrypt hash in 284 ms [main] WARN org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptor - Error decrypting content using Bcrypt-derived key; attempting legacy key derivation for backward compatibility [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Creating Bcrypt hash with salt [b1caf96a7d55025d8b34782a8c9f315a] (16 bytes) [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Generated Bcrypt hash in 283 ms [main] WARN org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.KeyDerivationBcryptSecureHasher - Using Legacy Key Derivation on bcrypt hash including cost and salt [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Plaintext (29): This is a plaintext message.

testcase.name: testScryptSaltShouldBe16Bytes
